fieldDescription: Navigate left in the core campaign menu; open the Character tab from Fleet, open Cargo from Map.
Navigate right in the core campaign menu; open the Refit tab from fleet, open Intel from Map.
If the interact option indicator is being shown when it shouldn't, this key can be used to temporarily disable it.
Indicators will fade if not controlled.
Indicators will fade after this amount of seconds have passed since it was controlled.
Once the indicator disappears the selection will be reset. The next time the hotbar is scrolled through it will start at 1.
Color used for the 4 arrows indicating the current selection.
